author: reidak49
title: awesome
review: like all piraka hakann is awesome! the zamors the light up eyes the lava gun and glow in the dark teeth i like the feet and the metalic grey is cool two  but one con the necks arnt poseible and over all awesome

author: Gus_263
title: Great stuff
review: Hakann is my second piraka. For me it is great, the colors like scorched armors, the spine makes your face like a thief, and its weapon, the lava launcher are too a claw. If you are searching for red bionicles to make creations, use this set,the laser piece in the weapon can be used as a lightsaber. All piraka features  glow in the dark teeths and light up eyes.

author: DarthVader_
title: Awesome Piraka!
review: This is my favorite Piraka!  I like his laser gun and his zamor sphere launcher!  I like his spikes also!  He is one of my favorite Bionicles!  I like him alot and I wish they made more Bionicles cooler then him!

author: Z_wing
title: My only bionicle...
review:
I got this for christmas in 2006. I was not a fan of bionicle but I was happy with this.

Hakann
pros: is sort of posable, can fire a zamor sphere, eyes light up, teeth glow in the dark
cons: none

pieces
pros: feet, zamor spheres and launcher, lava gun
cons: none

build
pros: sort of easy, strong
cons: none

price
pros: cheap
cons: should be £1.00 cheaper

I recommend this set to any bionicle fan
I hope you found my review helpful

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO BIONICLE (Piraka) - Hakann Review
review:
This is a nice figure to have and it's fun to play with as well.

Box/Instructions

The instruction has 32 pages and there're no mistakes in it.

Parts

This set has 42 pieces and it was 9 USD when it was on sale. That means that the price per piece ratio was about 21 cents per piece which is a little bit high but it's still worth the money.

The build

The build is very fun and easy and we also don't need to worry about stickers.

The completed model

[img]http://www.klokriecher.de/gallery_pics/l/8901-1.jpg[/img]


The arms, the hands, the legs, the feet and the head can be adjusted. One one hand we can see a cool looking gun and on the other hand we can see a launcher which shoots very well. If you push the head of this figure you can see that the eyes are going to glow. What's also nice about the piraka figures is that the teeth can glow in the dark, too.

Summary

All in all this set is an great set and I would HIGHLY recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de

Videos I made of this set:

Stopmotion

Review

author: tkettle9719
title: Piraka of Fire!
review:
I got this Piraka for full price at Walmart, and favor this Piraka as my favorite one in my collection, whether it be that this guy has two guns (or long-range weapons), or the fact that red Bionicles are always my favorite, this one is cool.

Pros

  • -The gun on his right hand is awesome, a great weapon, and feels even more complete with the red rod in it.
  • -This Bionicle takes up the newer dark red, which by that time had grown accustomed to red Bionicles everywhere.
  • …

Cons

  • -The mask looks quite awesome in the front, but the mask in the back deproves the overall functionality of this guy.
  • -I also don't like the choice of red eyes for all of the Piraka; I understand that this guy is supposedly evil, but he just looks better with green eyes.
  • …

This set is really quite nice, and the mask is great for any collection, though it brings major limitations to the table. Get this set, but be warned about the mask.
